duties_responsibilities.duty: Manage and analyze WGU's compensation programs in collaboration with business leaders and People & Talent team
Participate in job description and market reviews, and the job creation process
Conduct salary surveys to understand competitive compensation levels and make recommendations
Communicate and coach business leaders and employees on compensation processes and policies
Administer merit, annual, and market adjustments
Ensure consistent administration of compensation programs in compliance with company policies and government regulations
Work on core compensation projects and conduct ad-hoc analysis on compensation policies and programs
Perform other related duties as required

education_certification.credential: Bachelor’s degree in Human Resources, Business, or a related field (Master's preferred)
